Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "外链返回Vue触发事件" (#7358) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
当从外链返回Vue时，可以触发相应事件对页面进行更新。例如H5支付场景，从Vue中跳转到支付宝H5页面，支付完成后，返回Vue，这时需要检查支付是否完成，这个时候需要调用一个事件来确认是否支付成功

### What does the proposed API look like?
做为生命周期事件，当从外链返回Vue时，触发相应事件

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "watching a space delimited path" (#7357) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
I thought that the vue watcher should be able to watch any path that can be accessed via `foo.bar['some property name delimited with spaces'].value` so I edited the regex responsible for the parsing.

https://github.com/vuejs/vue/issues/4133

I'm not sure if it will break anything, and I'm not sure what your intention was anyway, trying to parse strings to create functions out of them, like `a + b' for example, I'm a bit confused. Anyway, I hope you'll consider this change, I'm going to use it privately because I need it.

here's the commit/pull request anyway
https://github.com/vuejs/vue/pull/7356

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Issue in nested vue-route when refresh " (#1959) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/ksankumar/pen/rpwxNv](https://codepen.io/ksankumar/pen/rpwxNv)

### Steps to reproduce
Need a help in nested vue-route
Jan 01, 2018 12:57
I have more page.
By landing i wanna show either login or dashboard page.

In dashboard page i have some navigation menus. When i click items in menu, i want to show menu content in dashboard page.


### What is expected?
/dashboard ->dashboard page with menu
/menu1 -> menu content in dashbaord page with same menus

when i refresh /menu1 that menu and menu content should be persist

### What is actually happening?
in refresh menus got destroyed

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "How Do I Watch The Routes Added By Method addroutes() ?" (#1955) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
when l add routes by addRoutes , I can not watch them by $router.options.routes, so where can I
get their value? Thank you for answer!

### What does the proposed API look like?
It is simple but convenient！
